DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate sexual function patient suspect non muscle invasive bladder cancer ( NMIBC ) . The investigator hypothesis reduce sexual function underdiagnosed patient non-muscle invasive bladder cancer active examination treatment may worsen sexual function .
DOC.brief_title: Sexual Function Patients Suspected Non-muscle Invasive Bladder Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients primary hematuria , gross microscopic Men woman older equal 40 year age Signed informed consent statement Men woman young 40 year age Patients recurrent hematuria know causative disease Already know urogenital cancer Previous massive pelvic surgery pelvic radiotherapy TURP within last 2 month Participants diagnose tumor originate ureter , renal pelvis kidney , bladder tumor T stage equal T1b .
